attributes.action: Enable ranking and searching of e-petitions by number of votes
attributes.additional_details: This e-petition site at the moment makes it difficult to build support for any specific proposals because the search terms usually provide hundreds of possible similar petitions in no particular order. By enabling any search to be ranked by number of existing votes, the most popular petition in that category, if it meets the wishes of the searcher, will more quickly build greater support and receive parliamentary discussion. This site should enable searching and ranking of petitions by number of existing votes.

rejection.details: It is already possible to rank e-petitions by signature by clicking on the 'signatures' column at any time.
